html:
10.2.18  7:35 pm   yo what made you decide to stop the moon song where you did, i'm usually all on board with your philosophy of making songs only as long as they absolutely need to be & then gtfo but even i was like "damn this could have been another verse maybe"

     ah, i'm sorry for this. i have received the memo and it will never happen again

10.2.18  7:33 pm   It has been my dream for a long time to write music for a living, and Ive been learning, but Im afraid I'll fail and then have nowhere to turn. But I'm also afraid that if I give up, I might have been super successful. Do you have any advise?

     write more music

10.2.18  7:30 pm   What is your greatest achievement as a person?

     being normal

10.2.18  7:24 pm   are u gonna try to maybe implement the theoretical 1 week schedule with this song?

     not yet, but for the one that just came out i should have

10.2.18  7:18 pm   Why do you let people ask you questions?

     could be fun

10.2.18  7:08 pm   Did you figure out the formula? 

     no but i might be able to come up with some

10.2.18  7:04 pm   what do you think of cargo shorts that are too loose

     they're too loose

10.2.18  7:03 pm   how do you come up with the ideas for all your songs?

     i still don't know

10.2.18  6:59 pm   What inspired you to become a weird but cool person?

     it seemed like the most sensible thing to do

10.2.18  6:56 pm   do you have names for the various outfits you wear in your videos? mainly asking because i know you're pretty particular in planning stuff out in writing/typing

     the wardrobe is not planned

10.2.18  6:57 pm   Do you think it's sometimes stressful when you make songs?

     yes

10.2.18  6:55 pm   What do you do if mt st hellens is about to blow up?

     probably give it some space

10.2.18  6:54 pm   what are you most serious about?

     comedy/humour

10.2.18  6:52 pm   i'm not really the most financially stable person and neither do i live in a very financially stable country. that said, do you think it is a good idea spend a lot of saved up money on a midi keyboard so i can actually learn to compose instead of playing around in flstudio

     if you had a keyboard wouldn't you want to keep using the same program still?

10.2.18  6:49 pm   why are the parenthesis in the new song's title only on youtube? (as far as i know)

     that was a publicity stunt

10.2.18  6:46 pm   So someone said something to me and I couldn't hear what it was so I pretended to agree, but now I think it might have been something important and feel really bad I don't know how to deal with this.

     it's ok just don't do it again

10.2.18  6:19 pm   Your new song is great - but why is it so short?

     too frisky

10.2.18  6:42 pm   are the aaaaah background vocals for the airplane in the business class section the first of their kind in bill wurtz song world? they sound really new

     i've done it before but this time it was probably more obvious because the bass drops out, etc

10.2.18  6:41 pm   What would you name a pet pinguin?

     pingo

10.2.18  6:18 pm   How does the symphony stay afloat if all of their performances are free?

     they may have to make a boat

10.2.18  4:36 pm   I'm in the process of writing college application essays, any tips on good topic ideas?

     you've got to figure out what the judges like to read. maybe you could penetrate their social circle some how

10.2.18  3:54 pm   In the production stage, do you have always on a compressor/limiter in the stereo mix? Or do you master the song after finishing mixing? 

     i used to never use one at all because i didn't know any better. then i discovered it and just left it on from the start, because i didn't know any better. then i decided i should start with it off. then i realized it might be actually better to leave it on the entire time, so you know what you're playing into

10.2.18  3:36 pm   Why do you use the trumpet sound so sparingly? Not that its a bad thing, i honestly love the surprise of hearing it in your songs

     makes the song feel more expensive, because it gives off the impression that i had the budget to hire a horn section just for 1 hit

10.2.18  2:41 pm   i have so much to do that when im done im too tired to do actual cool stuff. how to untire?

     stay in a light state of exercise throughout the work day. this may seem like it would make you more tired at the end of the day but it does not

10.2.18  2:16 pm   Which key does the church hold?

     the key to the steeple, for sure

10.2.18  2:08 pm   What's the 27th word in the 8th song you'll release from now?

     i don't know yet

10.2.18  1:19 pm   What is the best song you have done so far?

      henry's the navigator's navigation song (an ode to the navigation of henry the navigator)

10.2.18  12:58 pm   can you go to rehab again and continue singing about going home and changing your name and lamps and using alien crickets?

     alien crickets i will definitely use more. the last 3 times i tried to use it it was too scary for the situation but i am looking forward to using it again

10.2.18  12:10 pm   what do you think about doing a song in an usual time signature, like maybe 15/8

     if the shoe fits,

10.2.18  12:01 pm   have you added a new manager who is simplifying other tasks in your life, or did you strengthen your juggling skills? one week?? art thou no longer mortal

     i was thinking of adding something else

10.2.18  11:50 am   why is the q in ueqstions green?

     because it is going on an adventure!

10.2.18  11:44 am   chord recommendations?

     F

10.2.18  10:57 am   what do people mean when they say "business email"?

     it's like a regular email just to say hello and talk about how the two of you could potentially make money off each other some how

10.2.18  10:24 am   should i use a simple melody for complex lyrics 

     [very bob ross voice] in your world,

10.2.18  10:04 am   would you ever go mainstream

     sometimes it's fun to make new streams main

10.2.18  9:30 am   when is the new song coming?

     oct 16

10.2.18  9:05 am   have a glorious rest when new thing is released : )  sweet dreams see you soon

     actually last time i think i took too much rest

10.2.18  8:37 am   I was under the impression that the eruption of Mount St Helens was a state secret. How did you find out?

     wikipedia

10.2.18  7:20 am   Which cadence do you think is stronger? ii V I, or IV V I?

     how does the song go

10.2.18  6:58 am   Do you follow the rules of counterpoint when songwriting?

     everyone may have their own rules

     Which ones do you follow or break?

     i follow and break my own and others'

10.2.18  6:51 am   What's the craziest thing you've done in a song, music-theory-wise?

     made it up

10.2.18  6:47 am   What's the most "out there" music theory concept that you have used in a song? Like any weird time signatures or harmony concepts?

     post war economic miracle?

10.2.18  5:52 am   So, Jimmy Johnson wants to record a couple of your tunes for you. Would you send him the charts?

     is this for real

10.2.18  4:46 am   do you listen to pop music?

     yes

10.2.18  4:45 am   what is your superpower?

     being normal

10.2.18  4:31 am   10.1.18  3:06 pm I find this sentiment very interesting. Care to elaborate?

     i think the person was trying to get me to blame someone else for being bad, not good, etc ........ and while i do love a good blame game, it is important to remember that we're all on this blame train together

10.2.18  12:23 am   The alphanumeric string the staircase in hallelujah. Wat do? Wat IS?

     could be the railing

10.2.18  12:16 am   what to do if i hate myself?

     wander the streets of love

10.1.18  10:54 pm   nothing wouldn't be if something already isn't. you follow me? cuz it's like nothing and something can exist at the same time but only if something was here first

     looks like you got that squared away

10.1.18  10:17 pm   Hey bill, I have to write 250 words about how I demonstrate my "good character" to try to become a part of the National Honors Society at my school.   What do you think the mean by "good character"?

     being able to explain how good you are
